definition: to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Experience the best of Canberra on this full day Hop-On Hop-Off sightseeing Discovery tour of the Australian capital city.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐堪培拉城市觀光遊覽車去遊覽澳大利亞的首都。

sentences.english: Australia's close little neighbors will remain a headache for Canberra.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亞的小近鄰將仍然是堪培拉的頭痛問題。

sentences.english: Many Canberrans are employed by government departments such as the Australian Treasury.
sentences.chinese: 許多堪培拉人都僱傭於政府部門，如澳大利亞財政部。

sentences.english: We went first to the Canberra Glassworks.
sentences.chinese: 我哋先去參觀堪培拉嘅玻璃廠。

sentences.english: Canberra-Nara park with Kasuga stone lanterns framed by the gate.
sentences.chinese: 堪培拉奈良公園的大門上裝飾着日本春日的石燈籠。

sentences.english: It was just after dusk when we arrived in Canberra.
sentences.chinese: 天微亮時，我已抵達堪培拉的國會大廈。

sentences.english: 1913 - Canberra becomes the capital of Australia.
sentences.chinese: 1913年的今天，堪培拉成爲澳大利亞的首府。

sentences.english: Mother and child albino kangaroos in Canberra, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亞堪培拉的白化病袋鼠母子。

sentences.english: The government in Canberra wants to avoid a repeat of the Vietnam War.
sentences.chinese: 堪培拉政府希望避免重複越南戰爭的局面。

sentences.english: Canberra with destroyer alongside, Savo Island in background.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亞巡洋艦堪培拉號在沉沒，遠方是薩伏島。

definition: Sydney, capital of New South Wales, Australia

pinyin: Xin1 Nan2 Wei1 er3 shi4 zhou1

definition: capital territory/Australian Capital Territory (ACT) around Canberra 堪培拉
Northern Territory, sparsely populated federal territory extending from center to north of Australia
Tasmania (abbr. for 塔斯曼尼亞州|塔斯曼尼亚州)
Perth, capital of Western Australia/also written 帕斯
